attributes.action: scrap the new logo for the Olympics immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new logo for the 2012 Olympics looks like, among other things, a piece from a baby’s jigsaw, a fat deformed swastika and the worst piece of graphic design ever attributed to a public project.

It is truly awful. It already looks dated. It is aesthetically appalling. It doesn't even really look like '2012'.

What a shocking waste of money!

Please scrap this lurid logo now and open up a competition to everyone in Britain to design a new one. Then we can all have a vote on the favourite, which would, in turn, raise awareness and help to foster a sense that in some way the games belong to us. You could even charge a few pence to vote and raise some money for the games along the way. Have you not seen how popular programmes like X-Factor are? Gees! Why isn't anyone with a modicum of business sense and cultural awareness on the management committee?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
